Interface IKeyedImageCache

Represents a set-and-forget keyed image cache on a record guid.

Namespace: Snowflake.Caching
Assembly: Snowflake.Framework.Primitives.dll
Syntax
public interface IKeyedImageCache

Methods

Add(Stream, Guid, String)

Adds an image to the image cache, generating resized image/jpeg versions of the files, and returning a list of file records.

Declaration
IList<IFileRecord> Add(Stream imageStream, Guid recordGuid, string imageType)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.IO.Stream imageStream

The image to add as a stream
System.Guid recordGuid

A record to link to
System.String imageType

The type of image See ImageTypes for recognized image types
Returns
Type Description
System.Collections.Generic.IList<IFileRecord>

The generated file records with appropriate metadata linking it to the cache folder

Add(Stream, Guid, String, DateTime)

Adds an image to the image cache, generating resized image/jpeg versions of the files, and returning a list of file records.

Declaration
IList<IFileRecord> Add(Stream imageStream, Guid recordGuid, string imageType, DateTime dateTime)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.IO.Stream imageStream

The image to add as a stream
System.Guid recordGuid

A record to link to
System.String imageType

The type of image See ImageTypes for recognized image types
System.DateTime dateTime

A date time to link it to.
Returns
Type Description
System.Collections.Generic.IList<IFileRecord>

The generated file records with appropriate metadata linking it to the cache folder
